version_description:
Follow trending topics, entertainment videos and personalized news with the latest version of our Opera News app, now with new features:
1. Interest graph: get personal recommendations for topics to customize your news feed.
2. More local news options targeted to different countries.
3. Minimized download size.

Follow trending topics, entertainment videos and personalized news with the latest version of our Opera News app, now with new features:
1. Interest graph: get personal recommendations for topics to customize your news feed.
2. More local news options targeted to different countries.
3. Minimized download size.

Follow trending topics, entertainment videos and personalized news with the latest version of our Opera News app, now with new features:
1. Interest graph: get personal recommendations for topics to customize your news feed.
2. More local news options targeted to different countries.
3. Minimized download size.
4. Fix crash bugs.

Follow trending topics, entertainment videos and personalized news with the latest version of our Opera News app, now with new features:
1. Interest graph: get personal recommendations for topics to customize your news feed.
2. More local news options targeted to different countries.
3. Minimized download size.
4. Fix crash bugs.

1.Instaclips Video：
Instaclips collects the latest trending videos for you to enjoy. Instaclips collects the latest entertaining and viral videos for you to enjoy and share with friends.

2.Improved news slideshow:
More new slides templates available; easier to enjoy with swiping.

3.Support for more countries and languages:
Choose from more local news options.

4.Multiple image viewing support:
You can view multiple images at the same time on the main news page.

1.Instaclips Video：
Instaclips collects the latest trending videos for you to enjoy. Instaclips collects the latest entertaining and viral videos for you to enjoy and share with friends.

2.Improved news slideshow:
More new slides templates available; easier to enjoy with swiping.

3.Support for more countries and languages:
Choose from more local news options.

4.Multiple image viewing support:
You can view multiple images at the same time on the main news page.

1.Instaclips Video：
Instaclips collects the latest trending videos for you to enjoy. Instaclips collects the latest entertaining and viral videos for you to enjoy and share with friends.

2.Improved news slideshow:

3.Support for more countries and languages:

4.Multiple image viewing support:
You can view multiple images at the same time on the main news page.

Thanks for choosing Opera News! In this new version we had the following changes:
1. Released new video features
2. Improved the video channel
3. Improved news features
4. Optimised UX designs

Thanks for choosing Opera News! In this new version we had the following changes:
1. Released new video features
2. Improved the video channel
3. Improved news features
4. Optimised UX designs

1. Improved Video publish and play performance
2. You can enjoy India Cricket
3. You can read offline news and history news
4. Fixed bugs

Hello Opera News readers!

We are working overtime to continually improve to become your favorite news reading App.Our goal is to help people around the world live safer,more vibrant,more connected lives through the power of local news and information.

-This release brings bug fixes and performance improvements.

Do you have feedback for us on how we can improve Opera News？Please email us at feedback-opera-news-app@opera.com
